titles.title: A resolution recognizing and honoring the 150th anniversary of the establishment of the Yosemite Grant Act.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary: 6/25/2014--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes and honors the 150th anniversary of the establishment of the Act titled "An Act authorizing a Grant to the State of California of the 'Yo-Semite Valley' and of the Land embracing the 'Mariposa Big Tree Grove'" approved June 30, 1864 (commonly known as the Yosemite Grant) on June 30, 2014.
